p.b: https://sn2.scholastic.com/issues/2019-20/040420.htmlÂ Go to the Aprill issue The Volcano That Stopped Summer
Read the Scholastic News and answer the questions on page 4.
Answer the questions on the bottom of this page as well.
On the back of this page, write what you would do without a summer. You may also draw a picture of what you think the year without a summer would look like.
How many years ago did Mount Tambara erupt?_______________________________________________
What was invented the year there was no number?_____________________________________________
